about_the_game:
The Chronicle Edition adds a plethora of content outside of the game for players to use and read.

This DLC makes all latest additions outside of the game easy to access, all packaged up into one DLC - as well as lots of extras!

Installing and Using the Chronicle Edition

1: Click "Download", the game will open.
2: Close the game, and go over to White Pearl in your Steam Library.
3: Check the DLC content for it to install. It may install automatically.

To access the DLC:
1: Right click on White Pearl in your Steam Library, and select "Properties".
2: Click "Browse Local Files".
3: DLC contents are within the DLC highlighted folder.

What's in the Chronicle Edition?


The Definitive Official Guide
This massive sprawling 182-page booklet contains information on how to complete the game, the game's skills, spells, items, armours etc.
This guide was fully written, compiled and edited by the developer of the game, Harry Gill, and has gone through numerous iterations since the game's seemingly never-ending updates, but don't worry, after 15 revisions, it's done now!

(It's actually quite rare you see them nowadays but I really liked making this...)

Additional notes and credits on the guide:
- Updated in March 2020 with extra sections and content following updates of the main game
- Story and 100% completion walkthrough largely written by Firefly

Developer Comments
Learn how the developer made the game by reading this.

(It's really not interesting, and it's quite embarrassing to read back on this.)

...Free DLC for a free game! (I hope you make good use out of this...)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz (Willamette)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: On-Board Graphics Card
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-Board Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Pentium 4 equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-Board Sound Card

short_description: Expand your knowledge of White Pearl with this DLC, containing unused and cut content from the game - updated official documents - as well as never before seen footage and screenshots.
